m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Getting a Boost Following Positive Coverage Initiation - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Getting a Boost Following Positive Coverage Initiation By Kurumi Fukushima | 05/05/15 - 09:00 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) are getting a boost, up 3.18% to $237.85 in pre-market trading Tuesday, after analysts at Jefferies initiated coverage on the electric car maker this morning. Jefferies issued a "buy" rating with a $350 price target on shares of Tesla, saying concerns about China sales are overblown. Analysts pointed to its detailed consumer survey that showed Tesla could sell at least 500,000 cars per ye
